languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт качает головой.{/n} "Мысли {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} столь юрки и непостоянны, что смущают и путают даже своих хозяев. Поразительно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт качает головой.{/n} "Мысли {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} столь юрки и непостоянны, что смущают и путают даже своих хозяев. Поразительно".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Mon-keigh{/g} thoughts are so nimble and fickle that they puzzle and confuse even their own masters. Fascinating."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特摇了摇头。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}的思想如此灵活，如此善变，甚至会令思想的主人本人感到困惑。这真是令人着迷。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Mon-keigh{/g} thoughts are so nimble and fickle that they puzzle and confuse even their own masters. Fascinating."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特摇了摇头。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}的思想如此灵活，如此善变，甚至会令思想的主人本人感到困惑。这真是令人着迷。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "Mon-keigh thoughts are so nimble and fickle that they puzzle and confuse even their own masters. Fascinating."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Los pensamientos de los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} son tan ágiles y veleidosos que confunden incluso a sus dueños. Fascinante».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Mon-keigh{/g} thoughts are so nimble and fickle that they puzzle and confuse even their own masters. Fascinating."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Los pensamientos de los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} son tan ágiles y veleidosos que confunden incluso a sus dueños. Fascinante».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは首を横に振る。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}の思考はとても機敏かつ気まぐれなものだ。ゆえに、己が主人ですらも困惑させ、混乱させる。面白いな」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Mon-keigh{/g} thoughts are so nimble and fickle that they puzzle and confuse even their own masters. Fascinating."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは首を横に振る。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}の思考はとても機敏かつ気まぐれなものだ。ゆえに、己が主人ですらも困惑させ、混乱させる。面白いな」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}-Gedanken sind derart behände und wankelmütig, dass sie selbst ihre eigenen Herren verwirren und vor Rätsel stellen. Faszinierend."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Mon-keigh{/g} thoughts are so nimble and fickle that they puzzle and confuse even their own masters. Fascinating."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}-Gedanken sind derart behände und wankelmütig, dass sie selbst ihre eigenen Herren verwirren und vor Rätsel stellen. Faszinierend."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet secoue la tête.{/n} « Les pensées des {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} sont si inconstantes qu'elles rendent perplexes même leurs propres maîtres. C'est fascinant. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shakes her head.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Mon-keigh{/g} thoughts are so nimble and fickle that they puzzle and confuse even their own masters. Fascinating."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet secoue la tête.{/n} « Les pensées des {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} sont si inconstantes qu'elles rendent perplexes même leurs propres maîtres. C'est fascinant. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Mon-keigh{/g} düşünceleri öylesine seri ve kararsız ki kendi efendilerini bile şaşkına çevirebiliyorlar. Büyüleyici bir şey."
